t: Amazon Buys Brilliance Audio
s: May 23, 2007 - Amazon already offers more than 100,000 spoken word titles, but says sales could grow faster clip if more titles were available. To that end, the e-tailer revealed this morning that it has acquired Brilliance Audio, the Grand Haven, Mich. independent producer of audiobooks.

t: Amazon buys audio book publisher Brilliance
s: February 19, 2011 - Brilliance Audio, a Grand Haven, Mich.-based company, produces audio recordings of books for consumers and libraries, resellers and other book publishers. Its titles are sold on audio or MP3-based CDs and as digital downloads. The company publishes 12 to 15 titles a month, according to its Web site.

t: Amazon.com-Acquires-Brilliance-Audio - US Press Center
s: December 20, 2022 - SEATTLE--(BUSINESS WIRE)--May 23, 2007--Leading online retailer Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) today announced it has acquired Brilliance Audio (www.brillianceaudio.com), the largest independent publisher of audiobooks in the United States.

t: Amazon.com acquires Brilliance Audio - mlive.com
s: May 23, 2007 - Brilliance Audio has grown to more than 120 employees, plus 50 to 75 freelancers. The company publishes 12 to 15 audio books each month, company officials have said.
